settings.title: System Settings
settings.description: Configure printer connection, hardware ports, and material profiles here.

bot.title: Bot Click Sequence
bot.description: Create as many clicks as needed. Press "Capture" and move the mouse to the desired screen position within 3 seconds.

gcode.title: End-Gcode Generator
gcode.description: Generate the code for automatic ejection. Paste it into the slicer's Machine End G-code.

temps.title: Temperatures
temps.why_no_buffer_text: No 5¬∞C buffer is needed here, as the mechanical push command follows immediately. Set the exact temperature at which the material releases reliably.

position.title: Push Position
position.center_text: Aim exactly for the center of gravity of your part. This prevents the print from rotating or jamming while pushing. (Bed center = 128)
position.plastic_info: Use the plastic, not the nozzle
position.plastic_text: This is the distance between the nozzle tip and the print bed. Choose a height so that ideally the solid plastic housing of the print head pushes the part, not the delicate nozzle itself!

instruction.title: Where does the code go?
instruction.text: Insert the generated code exactly before the following block in the Machine End G-code:

rights.title: 1. Usage Rights
rights.text: This software is provided as freeware free of charge. You may download, install, and use the software indefinitely. Use for private as well as expressly for commercial purposes (e.g., in commercial 3D print farms) is permitted.

restrictions.title: 2. Restrictions
restrictions.no_sale: No Sale: You may not sell, rent, lease, or offer this software (in whole or in part) for a fee in any form.
restrictions.no_mod: No Modification: Modifying, translating, decompiling, or creating derivative works from the software or underlying source code is prohibited.
restrictions.no_commercial: No Commercial Appropriation: You may not incorporate this code into your own commercial software.

distribution.title: 3. Distribution
distribution.text: You may freely copy and distribute this software, provided it is done free of charge, the software remains unmodified, and this license notice is retained.

liability.title: 4. Disclaimer
liability.text: THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. The author (Nils Belling) assumes no liability for direct or indirect damages, data loss, hardware defects, or production downtimes resulting from the use of this software. Use of the software to control hardware is expressly at your own risk.

privacy.title: 5. Privacy
privacy.text: This application works 100% locally. No personal data or telemetry data is collected or transmitted to the internet.
